body:
like "Ajani Goldmane", "Jace, the Mind Sculptor"
they are new types.

java.lang.RuntimeException: No corresponding MagicType for Planeswalker
	at magic.model.MagicType.getType(MagicType.java:38)
author: [neoedmund](https://code.google.com/u/neoedmund/)
title: Planeswalker not implemented

comments.body:
Added the "Planeswalker" card type in revision 616d2f6e619d , though we have no plans to add support for planeswalker as the current AI is not able to deal with the increase in attacking options brought about by the addition of planeswalkers.

**Status:** Fixed
comments.author: [melvinzh...@gmail.com](https://code.google.com/u/108278210804167927868/)

content:
_From [neoedmund](https://code.google.com/u/neoedmund/) on March 15, 2012 01:27:16_

like "Ajani Goldmane", "Jace, the Mind Sculptor"
they are new types.

java.lang.RuntimeException: No corresponding MagicType for Planeswalker
	at magic.model.MagicType.getType(MagicType.java:38)
